By Scorpio Maurus on Friday, July 28, 2006 - 03:50 am:

Alright I have all the GameShark codes converted to AR MAX. I was dumb enough to choose AR MAX over the shark and then quickly found out the codes for this game on AR MAX suck. Mow I wanted to post the codes here but I can't figure out how to get them to show up properly. I tried putting many spaces in between but the board Auto Corrects down to one space and the TAB button only moves the curso down into the username slot. Soooo if anyone wants the codes that are available for monsters 1, 2 and 3 to have Maxed stats please email me. I don't know Maybe Lisa or someone can tell me how to post them properly but until then all of you out there who have only Action Replay just holler and I'll send you the codes. Also note I only used these codes to ensure a monster strong enough to get all the way through Adventures and get a Flazer stone. I also found 4 cool Items from beating the S bosses. All the Items increase Adventure points. Thus making Adventures more explorable since you won't rung out of points hopefully.

By Scorpio Maurus on Sunday, August 6, 2006 - 12:27 pm:

I think 2 maxed Monsters should be enough to help anyone get through the Adventure Plus Dungeons and get any Rainbow Stones They Need. I first went through all 4 dungeons with only a Dragon with 999 in each stat and after I had all the Special Items e.g Wise Earrings he ended up having over 6,000 Adventure points all by himself. However if you need help with that here is the code for MAX Adventure Points:
A8G8-DJNG-HQMDD
3B36-R9GA-7ACQU

Also no one helped me figure out how to post these properly I had to figure it out by accident. So in case you're ever stuck trying to post and no one will help just press enter and the text goes down a line. Take care if anyone actually wants the Monster Three Codes let me know.
